value.description: Configure the machine to enable remote PowerShell.
value.label: Enable remote PowerShell

value.description: Shows detailed information for the IP address, subnet mask and default gateway for each adapter bound to TCP/IP.
value.label: List IP configuration

value.description: Custom multiline PowerShell script should be defined in script property. Optional parameters can be set in parameters property.
value.label: Executes a PowerShell script

value.description: Custom multiline shell script should be defined in script property. Optional parameters can be set in parameters property.
value.label: Executes a Linux shell script

value.description: Get the configuration of all network interfaces.
value.label: List network configuration

value.description: Checks if the local Administrator account is disabled, and if so enables it.
value.label: Enable administrator account

value.description: Checks registry settings and domain policy settings. Suggests policy actions if machine is part of a domain or modifies the settings to default values.
value.label: Verify RDP Listener Settings

value.description: Sets the default or user specified port number for Remote Desktop connections. Enables firewall rule for inbound access to the port.
value.label: Set Remote Desktop port

value.description: Removes the SSL certificate tied to the RDP listener and restores the RDP listerner security to default. Use this script if you see any issues with the certificate.
value.label: Restore RDP Authentication mode to defaults
